chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: Purifinity is the source code quality platform for developing high quality software. Due to each software project has different constraints, conventions and goals, the tools for supporting a wide range of projects need to be very flexible. The ultimate goal for such tools is to have an easy extensibility mechanism via plug-ins. Customers and users of the software are able to adapt the software to there own needs. A shelf software cannot provide all features which might be needed.

To reach this goal of extensibility, Purifinity is based on OSGi and Eclipse plug-ins and on Java EE. These techniques make it easy to create fragments of functionality with a well defined, central API to extend Purifinity to almost all needs.

In this manual the development of plug-ins is explained. It is explained how new languages and new types of files can be analyzed ( Analysis Plug-ins ) and how new evaluations can be performed on these analyzes ( Evaluation Plug-ins ).
